description:
Grimpeur GTX is the perfect ride & climb shoe for mountain excursions that include combined trekking and e-bike trails. Light, precise and comfortable, Grimpeur GTX ensures a comfortable pedal without any pressure on the foot and maximum grip on any terrain. The upper is crafted from suede and fabric, which hugs the foot snugly and protects from abrasion, while a high-performance rubber toe bumper reinforcement ensures durability. The lining features the Gore-Tex Extended Comfort membrane to guarantee total waterproofing and breathability.

The Extended Lacing System adapts perfectly to the instep and ensures an outstandingly precise fit. This is further enhanced by the highly advanced asymmetrical positioning of the closure that allows correct foot flex. The Kayland Ankle Lock Technology system protects the ankle and holds it firmly in place but allows natural movement. The heel is well anchored and ergonomic padding prevents blisters.
name: Kayland - R.O.I. Recreation Outfitters Inc. Grimpeur GTX - Mens
